text: Oleg Suslov (born February 1, 1969 in Stachanov, Sowjet Union) is a former Ukrainian football goalkeeper. ==Career == In Austria, he played for VfB Admira Wacker MÃ¶dling and SV Austria Salzburg in the Austrian Bundesliga. Suslov celebrated his greatest success in Austria at Salzburg, winning the Austrian championship title in the 1996/97 season. ==Honours == *Austrian Champion: 1997 *Austrian Supercup Winner: 1997 Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Austrian football champions Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players
